item.title: 三名妇女和一条狗被发现死在拉斯维加斯的两处公寓中，警方称他们开枪打死了一名持枪对峙的潜在嫌疑人。
item.description:
Three women and a dog were found dead in two separate apartments in Las Vegas as police say they shot and killed a potential suspect in the case who confronted them with a firearm, authorities say. https://t.co/mVCXh6rzeP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三参观了这家电动汽车制造商在欧洲的第一家工厂，柏林郊外的这家工厂在疑似纵火袭击切断电力供应约一周后恢复了生产。
item.description:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk visited the electric car maker's first European plant Wednesday as production resumed at the factory just outside Berlin about a week after a suspected arson attack cut its power supply. https://t.co/XMDJmFKWh7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 丹麦首相梅特-弗雷德里克森（Mette Frederiksen）周三表示，丹麦希望通过将征兵范围扩大到女性，并将男女服兵役的时间从 4 个月增加到 11 个月，来增加服兵役的年轻人数量。
item.description:
Denmark wants to increase the number of young people doing military service by extending conscription to women and increasing the time of service from 4 months to 11 months for both genders, Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said Wednesday. https://t.co/WuVgWhsR8g

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 退伍军人事务部扩大试管婴儿政策，将单身和同性已婚退伍军人纳入其中。
item.description:
VA to expand IVF policies to include single and same-sex married veterans. https://t.co/hKBux23xmY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京周三表示，如果俄罗斯的主权或独立受到威胁，俄罗斯随时准备使用核武器：
item.description:
Russian Pres. Vladimir Putin said Wednesday that Russia is ready to use nuclear weapons if its sovereignty or independence is threatened.

Read more: https://t.co/ETancfLKwD pic.twitter.com/YiUWWRogvq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 本周三，众议院将就一项可能禁止在美国使用 TikTok 平台的法案进行分水岭式投票。
item.description:
The high-stakes battle on Capitol Hill between lawmakers and TikTok over a potential ban of the popular social media app is set for a watershed House vote on Wednesday on a bill that could bar access to the platform in the U.S. https://t.co/R9lWHzZOjc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 从澳大利亚悉尼飞往新西兰奥克兰的拉塔姆航空公司波音 787 飞机在飞行途中突然坠落，一名乘客记录了飞机坠落后的惊慌场面。
item.description:
A passenger documented scenes of panic after a Boeing 787 operated by LATAM Airlines, after it dropped abruptly mid-flight from Sydney, Australia to Auckland, New Zealand. https://t.co/VfXCzPn9e8 pic.twitter.com/p8sVpKKzcL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据警方称，阿拉巴马州母亲马霍甘妮-杰克逊（Mahogany Jackson）于 2 月 26 日在阿拉巴马州伯明翰一个偏远地区的路边被发现后脑中弹，而在这之前几小时，她曾给母亲发短信称自己被绑架并寻求帮助。
item.description:
Alabama mother Mahogany Jackson was found shot in the back of the head on Feb. 26 by the side of a road in a remote area in Birmingham, Alabama, hours after she texted her mother saying that she had been kidnapped and asking for help, according to police. https://t.co/1XSQAfg18q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的亲密助手和高级战略家列昂尼德-沃尔科夫指责俄罗斯总统普京的 "党羽 "是导致他在立陶宛首都住院的残暴袭击的幕后黑手，并发誓 "决不放弃"。
item.description:
Leonid Volkov, the late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny's close associate and top strategist, accused Russian Pres. Putin’s “henchmen” of being behind a brutal attack that left him hospitalized in Lithuania’s capital and vowed to “not give up.” https://t.co/wnlRwqQltZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）预测，根据投票分析，前总统特朗普将赢得夏威夷共和党党团会议。
item.description:
LATEST: Former Pres. Trump will win the Hawaii Republican caucuses based upon the analysis of the vote, ABC News projects. https://t.co/2UpH4IBxQh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据检察官称，两名男子涉嫌炸毁一名妇女的住宅，并计划将 "一条大蟒蛇放进受害人家中吃掉受害人的女儿"，因此受到指控：
item.description:
Two men have been charged after allegedly bombing a woman’s home and planning to release “a large python into the victim’s home to eat the victim’s daughter,” according to prosecutors.

Read more: https://t.co/BKbS2KcQ0a pic.twitter.com/33FPk2MA6t

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 两名男子被控炸毁妇女的住宅，并计划用大蟒蛇吃掉她的女儿。
item.description:
Two men charged with blowing up woman's home, planning to use large python to eat her daughter. https://t.co/S8OESbbO2Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 已宣布不再寻求连任的共和党众议员肯-巴克（Ken Buck）周二宣布，他将于下周末离开国会。
item.description:
Republican Rep. Ken Buck, who had already announced he would not be seeking reelection, announced Tuesday he will leave Congress at the end of next week. https://t.co/f5umzNIsoL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 新消息：俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，如果俄罗斯的国家地位、主权或独立受到威胁，俄罗斯随时准备使用核武器，但他希望美国不要采取可能引发核冲突的行动。
item.description:
NEW: Russian Pres. Vladimir Putin said that Russia is ready to use nuclear weapons if there is a threat to Russian statehood, sovereignty or independence, but said he hoped that the U.S. would refrain from actions that could trigger a nuclear conflict. https://t.co/hLe9mmStFb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，刑事转介可能成为陷入困境的拜登弹劾调查的 "退出策略"。
item.description:
Criminal referrals emerge as possible "exit strategy" of struggling Biden impeachment inquiry, sources say. https://t.co/S2TFB7194i

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普的律师在一份法庭文件中表示，他将不会在本月晚些时候的封口费审判中援引正式的 "律师建议 "辩护。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump will not invoke a formal "advice of counsel" defense in his hush money trial later this month, his lawyers signaled in a court filing.https://t.co/r9oGzzUwPk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，中国河北省北部一家餐馆发生强烈爆炸，造成至少 1 人死亡，22 人受伤。
item.description:
At least one person was killed and 22 injured after a strong explosion destroyed a restaurant in China's northern Hebei province, local media reported. pic.twitter.com/2ewO9Hnek6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 周二，至少有七个俄罗斯领土遭到数十架无人机的袭击，这是乌克兰在俄罗斯境内发动明显袭击的第二天：
item.description:
At least seven Russian territories were targeted by dozens of uncrewed drones on Tuesday, marking a second day of apparent Ukrainian strikes within Russia.

item.title: 研究人员发现了一种新方法，可以促进退化珊瑚礁种群的恢复。

item.title: 根据验尸官的报告，曾多次对公司生产标准提出质疑的波音公司前雇员周六死于 "自残式 "枪伤。
item.description:
The former Boeing employee who raised numerous concerns about the company's production standards died from a "self-inflicted" gunshot wound Saturday, according to a coroner's report.

Authorities said the investigation is still active.https://t.co/GIjKvNtpPy pic.twitter.com/jDqIU2Y3qb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 已故演员鲍勃-萨盖特（Bob Saget）的妻子凯莉-里佐（Kelly Rizzo）在《豪门盛宴》主演去世两年多后，坦言自己克服了悲痛，重新开始约会。
item.description:
Kelly Rizzo, the wife of late actor Bob Saget, is opening up about overcoming grief to be able to date again more than two years after "Full House" star's death. https://t.co/i43nwoM34E

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 三年前，俄勒冈州将少量非法药物（从芬太尼、冰毒到快克）非刑罪化。但一些州领导、居民和其他人对这项在 2020 年选民批准的倡议后通过的法律有了新的想法。
item.description:
Three years ago, Oregon decriminalized small amounts of illicit drugs, from fentanyl to meth to crack.

But some state leaders, residents and others are having second thoughts about the law, which was passed following a 2020 voter-approved initiative. https://t.co/73Nj5cGncv pic.twitter.com/2u2FGmVhqI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 警方称，在墨西哥一条高速公路边的墓地里发现了一具自今年 2 月起失踪的 54 岁妇女的尸体。
item.description:
The body of a 54-year-old woman missing since February has been found in a cemetery on the side of a highway in Mexico, police say. https://t.co/fFTDRYiXuT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024
